title: Lag since new patch
body: Just curious if anyone else is experiencing issues.  My readout in the top corner is FPS: 60 -100 MS: 36 which is what it always was but for some reason now the game is freezing at random times, lagging out hard even tho my connection/computer seem to be fine.  Could it be related to the DDoS attacks?

replies.body:
If you have Windows 10, a recent update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing sporadic freezing and fps issues for some players.  As a first step, I recommend disabling it for the fix.

If your issue continues then there may be other driver or game file problems getting in your way.  Go over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help!  Let me know if you have any questions.
